title: Yahoo Answers Not So Sharp when it comes to the Shroud of Turin
post:
It’s laughable, yet sad how misinformed people are on this subject.This subject being the Shroud of Turin, not probably, but the most important historical relic of all time.It baffles me that so many people, considering what this Shroud may mean to all mankind, do not take the time to study it further, to enlighten themselfs on the facts and wonderment of this most amazing icon.
